NAjah::

Najah avoided the shot again. and crept quickly towards Repressor's 
legs, trapping  them in with his body and when he knew that his body 
had around his legs he, like phyton,  squeezzed his body trying to 
make fall at Repressor

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Repressor::
> 
> Repressor watches Najah as he creeps quickly a distance away from 
him.
> 
> "You're not going to get anywhere by only dodging," he says, firing 
> more shots.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Najah::
> > 
> > "Thankssssss" hissed Najah
> > 
> > Najah avoided the shot and changing at Beast mode  crept quickly 
a
